title: Upcoming Travel: SxSW and Malofiej
content:
I will be at South-by-Southwest (SxSW) this year to speak on a panel, and also take part in the Malofiej awards and summit, where I will be a judge and speaker. Here are some pointers for those of you who might be at one (or both!) of those events. SxSW The panel I am on has the straight-forward title, Data Visualization is Dead, Long Live Data Visualization! Irene Ros (a former member of IBMâ€™s VCL, incidentally) is the organizer, and it also includes Dylan Lathrop and Rosten Woo . Between the artistic and pragmatic proponents of visualization, design, infographics, presentation, and analysis, we should have a few things to talk about.
